description.value:
The Weapons Masters, Body Guards, and Leaders of soldiers. Warriors without peer.
Skills: Common Lore (War), Dodge, Intimidate, Scholastic Lore (Tactica Imperialis), Secret Tongue (Military), Speak Language (Low Gothic).
Talents: Basic Weapon Training (Universal), Pistol Weapon Training (Universal), Melee Weapon Training (Universal), Thrown Weapon Training (Universal), Sound Constitution.
Gear: Good Hellgun or Best Longlas or two Common Boltpistols, one Good Primitive Melee Weapon of choice with mono upgrade, Micro-bead, void suit, Enforcer Light Carapace Armour, Bolt Shell Keepsake, Medikit, Manacles, Dataslate full of Wanted Bounties or Arms coffer or 3 doses of Stimm.
Special Ability: Weapon Master: Choose one class of weapon (SP, Bolt, etc), gain +10 to hit, +2 damage, and +2 initiative when using any weapon of chosen class.

specialAbilities.name: Special Ability
specialAbilities.description: Weapon Master: Choose one class of weapon (SP, Bolt, etc), gain +10 to hit, +2 damage, and +2 initiative when using any weapon of chosen class.

choices.label: Choose from: class of weapon (SP, Bolt, etc), gain +10 to hit, +2 damage, and +2 initiative when using any weapon of chosen class
options: and +2 initiative when using any weapon of chosen class
